verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass when <S%H834><s%> Sanballat, <S%H5571><s%> and Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> and Geshem <S%H1654><s%> the Arabian, <S%H6163><s%> and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of our enemies, <S%H341><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that I had built <S%H1129><s%> the wall, <S%H2346><s%> and that there was no <S%H3808><s%> breach <S%H6556><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> therein; (though <S%H1571><s%> at <S%H5704><s%> that time <S%H6256><s%> I had not set <S%H5975><s%> up the doors <S%H1817><s%> on the gates; <S%H8179><s%>)

That Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> and Geshem <S%H1654><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> let us meet <S%H3259><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> in some one of the villages <S%H3715><s%> in the plain <S%H1237><s%> of Ono. <S%H207><s%> But they thought <S%H2803><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> me mischief. <S%H7451><s%>

And I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> I am doing <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> so that I cannot <S%H369><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down: <S%H3381><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> should the work <S%H4399><s%> cease, <S%H7673><s%> whilst <S%H834><s%> I leave <S%H7503><s%> it, and come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to you?

Yet they sent <S%H7971><s%> to me four <S%H702><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> after this <S%H2088><s%> sort; <S%H1697><s%> and I answered <S%H7725><s%> them after the same <S%H2088><s%> manner. <S%H1697><s%>

Then sent <S%H7971><s%> Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> his servant <S%H5288><s%> to me in like <S%H2088><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> with an open <S%H6605><s%> letter <S%H107><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%>

Wherein was written, <S%H3789><s%> It is reported <S%H8085><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and Gashmu <S%H1654><s%> said <S%H559><s%> it, that you and the Jews <S%H3064><s%> think <S%H2803><s%> to rebel: <S%H4775><s%> for which <S%H3651><s%> cause you build <S%H1129><s%> the wall, <S%H2346><s%> that you may be their king, <S%H4428><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>

And you have also <S%H1571><s%> appointed <S%H5975><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> to preach <S%H7121><s%> of you at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> There is a king <S%H4428><s%> in Judah: <S%H3063><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> shall it be reported <S%H8085><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%> Come <S%H3212><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, and let us take counsel <S%H3289><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

Then I sent <S%H7971><s%> to him, saying, <S%H559><s%> There are no <S%H3808><s%> such <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> done as you say, <S%H559><s%> but you feign <S%H908><s%> them out of your own heart. <S%H3820><s%>

For they all <S%H3605><s%> made us afraid, <S%H3372><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Their hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be weakened <S%H7503><s%> from the work, <S%H4399><s%> that it be not done. <S%H6213><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O God, strengthen <S%H2388><s%> my hands. <S%H3027><s%>

Afterward I came <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah <S%H1806><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mehetabeel, <S%H4105><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was shut <S%H6113><s%> up; and he said, <S%H559><s%> Let us meet <S%H3259><s%> together in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the temple, <S%H1964><s%> and let us shut <S%H5462><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the temple: <S%H1964><s%> for they will come <S%H935><s%> to slay <S%H2026><s%> you; yes, in the night <S%H3915><s%> will they come <S%H935><s%> to slay <S%H2026><s%> you.

And I said, <S%H559><s%> Should such <S%H3644><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> as I flee? <S%H1272><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> is there, that, being as I am, would go <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> to save <S%H2425><s%> his life? <S%H2425><s%> I will not go <S%H935><s%> in.

And, see, <S%H2009><s%> I perceived <S%H5234><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> had not sent <S%H7971><s%> him; but that he pronounced <S%H1696><s%> this prophecy <S%H5016><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me: for Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> had hired <S%H7936><s%> him.

Therefore was he hired, <S%H7936><s%> that I should be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> and sin, <S%H2398><s%> and that they might have matter for an evil <S%H7451><s%> report, <S%H8034><s%> that they might reproach <S%H2778><s%> me.

My God, <S%H430><s%> think <S%H2142><s%> you on Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> according to these <S%H428><s%> their works, <S%H4639><s%> and on the prophetess <S%H5031><s%> Noadiah, <S%H5129><s%> and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> that would have put me in fear. <S%H3372><s%>

So the wall <S%H2346><s%> was finished <S%H7999><s%> in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> and fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month Elul, <S%H435><s%> in fifty <S%H2572><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that when <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> our enemies <S%H341><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that were about us saw <S%H7200><s%> these things, they were much <S%H3966><s%> cast <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> in their own eyes: <S%H5869><s%> for they perceived <S%H3045><s%> that this <S%H2063><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> was worked <S%H6213><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sent <S%H1980><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> to Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> and the letters of Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to them.

For there were many <S%H7227><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> sworn <S%H1167><s%> <S%H7621><s%> to him, because <S%H3588><s%> he was the son <S%H2860><s%> in law <S%H2859><s%> of Shechaniah <S%H7935><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Arah; <S%H733><s%> and his son <S%H1121><s%> Johanan <S%H3076><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah. <S%H1296><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> they reported <S%H559><s%> his good <S%H2896><s%> deeds before <S%H6440><s%> me, and uttered <S%H3318><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> to him. And Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> to put me in fear. <S%H3372><s%>
